getUserLiquidationThreshold(address,addr.details: calculate combined Liquidation Threshold based on user deposits

getUserMaximumLTV(address,address).details: calculate combined Maximum Loan-To-Value of user

returns._0: maximumLTV Maximum Loan-To-Value of given user

inDebt(address,address).details: check if user is in debt

returns._0: TRUE if user borrowed any amount of any asset, otherwise FALSE
